name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, read a haiku from Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, launch Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader is a simple skill that reads out a random haiku to the user. A haiku is a form of Japanese poetry.
For example, you can say, "Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a haiku".
